Components.Abstract.Signature

Class CSignatureComp

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • Components.CPAMOJAComponent
            • Components.Abstract.Signature.CSignatureComp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISignatureComp, INodeObject, IPAMOJAComponent, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class CSignatureComp
extends CPAMOJAComponent
implements ISignatureComp, INodeObject
    Holds the signature (abstract syntax) and maintains its consistency. It notifies its observers of changes in the signature.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
